title: === WORKFLOW STEPS ===
content:
write_step = Step(
    name="write_story",
    description="Write initial story",
    agent=story_writer,
)

edit_step = Step(
    name="edit_story",
    description="Edit and improve the story",
    agent=story_editor,
)

format_step = Step(
    name="format_story",
    description="Format the story into sections",
    agent=story_formatter,
)
